action-points-calc-description: Calculate Action Points from characteristics or a set static value. Mythras p. 8.  Mythras Imperative, M-Space and Odd Soot use 'Set at 2' by default.
animism-enabled-description: Enables the Animism section of the sheet.
arcane-magic-enabled-description: Enables the Arcane Magic section of the sheet.
attribute-toggle-description: Enable or disable the following attributes.
augment-tooltip: Modification from augmentation(applied before difficulty and does not increase critical value)
battle-units-enabled-description: Enable the battle unit sheet type
boating-description: List Boating as a standard skill. Luther Arkwright does not by default.
calculate-effective-armor-enc-as-quarter: Calculate effective ENC from armor as 1/4 actual
config-mode-msg: You are in Configuration mode. Here you can adjust how the sheet works and how values are calculated.
corruption-description: Enable corrupting passions; Mythras Companion p. 28.
default-hit-location-table-for-npcsu: Default Hit Location Table for NPCs
dependencies-description: Enable dependencies; Mythras Companion p. 29, Luther Arkwright p. 45.
dependency-bump-tooltip: Dependency increased for an experience roll in the past year
divine-magic-enabled-description: Enables the Divine Magic section of the sheet.
drive-description: List Drive as a standard skill. Luther Arkwright does not by default.
edit-mode-msg: You are in Edit mode. This mode is optimized for more permanent changes such as character creation and improvement.
extended-conflict-resolution-description: Use the extended conflict resolution system from M-Space & Odd Soot.  M-Space p. 42 or Odd Soot p. 72.
fae-powers-enabled-description: Enables the Fae Powers section of the sheet.
fire-rate-description: Add a Fire Rate field for automatic weapons; Luther Arkwright p. 97, AtVW p. 60.
fire-rate-enabled-description: Show fire rate in ranged weapons
folk-magic-enabled-description: Enables the Folk Magic section of the sheet.
folk-magic-range-description: Range, in meters, of Folk Magic spells with the Ranged trait.  AtVW uses 1/5 by default, p. 76.
fumbled-tooltip: Has fumbled since last experience roll
head: Head
help-configuration-info: Show options to change sheet type, enable or disable optional rules, and modify how the sheet works.
help-description: This is the help section covering the options bar and it's settings. It can be hidden or revealed at any time by clicking the question mark symbol in the upper-right.  Other help sections can be toggled with similar symbols found through-out the sheet.
help-edit-info: Use edit mode when building and improving your sheet.  Anything labeled Base Mod or Other is provided permanent or semi-permanent modifications.  For example, the effects of ageing on a characteristic, an additional Action Point from a gift or skill improvements from experience and training.  When disabled the sheet is optimized for game play.  In this mode Temp modifiers are provided for temporary adjustments.  Magic buffs and penalties for example.
help-show-name-info: Show the name in roll results.
help-whisper-info: Send roll results to the GM only.
herculean-mod-description: Herculean difficulty is 1/10 or 1/5 normal skill value.  Mythras Imperative, M-Space & Odd Soot use 1/5 by default.
hit-locations-description: Set default hit location table for new characters.
import-infomsg1: To import another character from the same data, simply add a new character, re-use the same import data and select a different character number to import.
import-infomsg2: Spirits associated with that character will be parsed out under "Imported Spirit Data" so they may be imported as individual Roll20 characters.
import-infomsg3: The import will determine if the character is a creature or spirit and set the sheet appropriately.
import-noticemsg1: Some browsers may display the import data in a user-friendly way, but for this we need the raw text data.  There will likely be a tab for the raw data and/or a button to copy it.
import-spirit-noticemsg1: It is recommended to delete imported spirit data after use.  This will help minimize the amount of data retained in this sheet.
import-step-five: Paste the contents of the data page into "Import Data" and set # to the character you wish to import.
import-step-fourC: Then click this to get and follow a link to the enemies json data
import-step-six: Click "Import as Minor Character" or "Import as Major Character"
import-step-three: Note the number at the end of the URL.  This is the enemy ID.  For example, if the template URL is "https://mythras.skoll.xyz/enemy-template/195/" the ID is "195".
import-step-two: Find your desired enemy and click to visit the template page.
import-warnmsg1: It is always recommended to import with a fresh character.  Importing on an existing character will overwrite data and may have unexpected results.
json-note-four: After import some fields may require additional work for full functionality.  For example, misc skills the importer couldn't identify, will be recorded as professional skills.  These may need to be re-located if they are not, in fact, professional skills.  In addition, professional skills will be logged with no base value.  All points will be allocated to experience.  You may wish to set the base characteristics to ensure characteristic modifiers work on these skills.  If so, remember to deduct the new base value from the experience field.  Spells and other magic powers will also require further configuration so their roll button will present accurate information.  As a general rule, anything with it's details section open, after import, could be further configured.  This additional work is at the GMs discretion and is likely not needed for most NPCs.
linguistics-enabled-description: Use the Linguistics skill instead of individual Language skills.
magic-points-description: List Magic Points as an attribute.
max-devotional-pool-description: Base the max devotional pool on cult rank or POW.  Mythic Constantinople uses POW by default, p. 80.
movement-one-clarification: Critical success on Athletics roll grants +1 movement
movement-three-clarification: Critical success on Swim roll grants +1 movement.
movement-two-clarification: These jump values assume a 5m run-up.
ms-psionics-enabled-description: Enables the Psionics section of the sheet per M-Space rules.
mysticism-enabled-description: Enables the Mysticism section of the sheet.
mythras-psionics-enabled-description: Enables the Psionics section of the sheet per Mythras rules.
name: Name
name-display-description: Show character name in the roll template.  Useful if you need to hide a characters true identity.
npc-decrecation-warning: Notice! The NPC sheet will be deprecated in the next version.  It will be replaced with mook sheet and other accompanying features.  To prepare you should copy your NPC stats to the main character sheet.
npc-hit-locations-description: Set default hit location table for new NPCs.
onscreen-tip-label: Display on-screen tips intended to help new users learn the sheet.
os-magic-enabled-description: Enables the Magic section of the sheet per Odd Soot rules.
play-mode-msg: You are in Play mode. This is the primary mode intended to be used during actual game play.
power-points-description: List Power Points as an attribute.
prana-points-description: List Prana Points as an attribute; Luther Arkwright p. 19.
rank-description: Characters have a Rank which is added to their total Luck Points. Classic Fantasy p. 9.
reach-description: Show a reach field for close-combat weapons; Mythras p. 106.  Mythras Imperative, M-Space & Odd Soot do not use reach by default.
recalc-notice: If your sheet values are incorrect, try clicking here.
results-need-to-be-added-to-the-initiati: Results need to be added to the initiative table manually
ride-description: List Ride as a standard skill. Luther Arkwright does not by default.
roll-display-description: Rolls are only shown to the GM and the player making the roll.
roman-magic-enabled-description: Enables the Roman magic section of the sheet for magic as used in Mythic Roman.
setting-description: Sets the default sheet options and mechanics to match the rules as presented in the setting's source book.  Individual options may be overridden below.
settings-warning: The below settings are generally set by your GM and should not be adjusted on a sheet by sheet basis.  They are provided here for visibility, experimentation and other rare use cases.  Make sure to check with your GM before making alterations.
show-reduced-description: Display a result for high skills reduced down to 100 in the roll templates.
simplified-combat-description: Uses the optional simplified combat rules from M-Space & Odd Soot. M-Space p. 75 or Odd Soot p. 100
social-conflict-description: Use social conflict rules from the Mythras Companion p. 14.
sorcery-enabled-description: Enables the Sorcery section of the sheet.
spirit-mechanics-enabled-description: Enable support for creatures which lack a physical body
spirits-have-tenacity-description: Spirits have Tenacity as an attribute.
status-description: List Status as a standard skill
strangeness-description: List Strangeness as an attribute; M-Space p. 122, Odd Soot Oddities p. 7.
superstition-description: List Superstition as a standard skill; Mythic Britain p. 136.
temp-damage-modifier-clarification: Temp Damage Mod represents the steps up or down the damage modifier table
the-soot-description: Provide a field to record a character's The Soot value. Odd Soot p. 48.
the-soot-is-a-standard-skill: The Soot is a Standard Skill
theism-enabled-description: Enables the Theism section of the sheet.
trained-tooltip: Has trained since last experience roll
upgrade-notice: If your sheet values are not correct after upgrading to v2.0, click here
vehicle-type-option-description: Type of vehicle mechanics to use.
vs101-tooltip: Penalty from opposing a score higher than 100(applied after difficulty, use negative values)
when-compact-only-starred-abilities-are-: When compact only starred abilities are shown
work-songs-enabled-description: Enables Works Songs per Thennla: Sorandib.  Appears in the Folk Magic section.
